column1: Department for Transport statistics
Energy and the Environment
ENV0401 Total greenhouse gas emissions from transport: United Kingdom, 1990-2010
(DfT Business Plan impact indicator1)
Domestic transport
International transport4
Total transport
1. Impact indicator: Total greenhouse gas emissions from transport
2. UK national emissions estimates are updated annually and any developments in
methodology are applied retrospectively to earlier years.
3. The figures in this table are 'by source' which means that they include direct emissions
and do not include emissions resulting from the production of the fuels used.
4. International aviation and international shipping emissions are not included in the national
total reported to the UNFCCC, since there is no internationally agreed way of allocating
these emissions to individual nation states.
Note: The basket of six greenhouse gases consists of carbon dioxide, methane, nitrous oxide, hydro-fluorocarbons, perfluorocarbons and sulphur hexafluoride
(CO2, CH4, N2O, HFCs, PFCs and SF6).
